Title: PAiRS - A WPF Memory Card Game
Description:
PAiRS is an implementation of a card matching game in which you are given an even number of cards face down in a grid, and you try to flip over 2 cards at a time to create a match until all cards are matched.

PAiRS is built using C#, .Net 3.5+ and WPF.
